Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier signal problem near Cottage Grove. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier signal problem near Cottage Grove.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
